entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 1.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 23 January 2023
